mapper.select: select top 1 s.sale_price salePrice,l.list_price listPrice ,c.defaultMarketId market from catalog_productPrivateLabelPriceSale s left join catalog_productResellerTypePrice l on s.pf_id = l.pf_id and s.gdshop_currencyType = l.gdshop_currencyType left join catalog_countrySite c on s.gdshop_currencyType = c.defaultCurrencyType where l.privateLabelResellerTypeID = 1 and s.pf_id=#{pfId} and c.defaultMarketId=#{market}
mapper.insert: insert into catalog_productPrivateLabelPriceSale (pf_id, privateLabelID, gdshop_serverGroupID, gdshop_variant_price_type_id, gdshop_currencyType, sale_start, sale_end, sale_price, createDate, priceStartDate, priceNewSaleExpirationDate, priceBasketExpirationDate, rowVersionID ) values (#{pfId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{privatelabelid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gdshopServergroupid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gdshopVariantPriceTypeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gdshopCurrencytype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{saleStart,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{saleEnd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{salePrice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pricestartdate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pricenewsaleexpirationdate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pricebasketexpirationdate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rowversionid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

insert into catalog_productPrivateLabelPriceSale
pf_id,
privateLabelID,
gdshop_serverGroupID,
gdshop_variant_price_type_id,
gdshop_currencyType,
sale_start,
sale_end,
sale_price,
createDate,
priceStartDate,
priceNewSaleExpirationDate,
priceBasketExpirationDate,
rowVersionID,
